name: Ship Defense
description:
Ship Defense

a game made for the Kenney Jam 2019 with the theme "Unlikey Combinations" over the course of 48h.

This is a tower defense game with a little twist, hence the name. Your towers are ships, pirate ships. 

We couldn't find a similar tower defense game on the internet and the idea of moving towers, therefore, is our unlikey combination.

Four playable levels with different layout, enemies and weapons await you. Adding the awesome music in the background and you feel like a real pirate.

How to Play
  • Click on a pirate ship to select it.
  • Select a weapon to buy for that ship.
  • Defeat all the enemies.
Credits

Sebastian Uitz (FireTotemGames)

  • Game Design
  • Programming

Brian Francis Majewski (Musicka)

  • Music
  • Sound Effects
Assets

The following Kenney.nl assets have been used in this game:

  • Adventure pack (UI)
  • Alien Spaceship (Effects)
  • Background Elements Redux (Effects)
  • Fonts (Kenney Bold)
  • Jumper Pack (Gold Coin)
  • Nature Kit (Environment)
  • Pirate Kit (Pirate Ships and Weapons)
  • Platformer Kit (Environment)
  • Space Kit (Weapons)
  • Watercraft Pack (Ships)
  • Weapon Pack (Weapons)
Changes
  • v1.0 - 11-08-2019 - no changes so far
